junit.framework.Test
public class SDocumentGraphStoringTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase

A test case for the model object 'SDocument Graph'.

The following features are tested:

  • STextual DSs
  • STextual Relations
  • STokens

Tests storing and reloading of document graph. This document graph contains STextualDS-objects, SToken-objects,... SLayer-objects tokens: tok1 tok2 tok3 tok4 | | | | text1: This is text1 . layer1: tok1, tok2, tok3 layer2: tok4

testStoring3

public void testStoring3()
                  throws java.io.IOException
Tests storing and reloading of document graph. This document graph contains STextualDS-objects, SToken-objects,... SLayer-objects structs: struct1 / \ spans: span1 span2 / \ / \ tokens: tok1 tok2 tok3 tok4 | | | | text1: This is text1 . layer1: tok1, tok2, tok3, tok4 layer2: span1, span2 + edges layer3: struct1 + edges

java.io.IOException
